full_output.summary: I am a proficient frontend and software developer, well-versed in diverse technologies. My expertise lies in crafting end-to-end solutions and staying abreast of industry trends to deliver impactful and innovative projects.

education.school: Accurate Institute of Management and Technology

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.description: I successfully developed a Temperature Converter website that allows users to input temperatures in various units (Fahrenheit, Celsius, and Kelvin) and instantly receive the converted values.

projects.name: To-Do Web Application
projects.description: Developed a To-Do web application with Login Authentication. The application allows users to manage tasks, set deadlines, and securely log in using authentication protocols.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed a personal portfolio website using React.js showcasing my skills, projects, and contact information. Implemented responsive design for optimal viewing on various devices.

projects.name: Nike Landing Page
projects.description: Demonstrated strong skills in frontend development by creating a visually appealing Nike landing page using HTML for structure, Tailwind CSS for styling, and JavaScript for dynamic functionalities.

projects.name: Movie Information Website
projects.description: Created a responsive movie website using HTML, CSS (Tailwind CSS), and JavaScript, delivering a visually appealing interface with modern web tech. Integrated external APIs for real-time movie data updates.

experiences.description: Developed and maintained user-facing websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and ReactJS.
